org.gbif.utils.file.tabular

Class TabularFileMetadataExtractor

    • Method Detail

      • extractTabularFileMetadata

        public static TabularFileMetadata extractTabularFileMetadata(Path filePath)
                                                      throws IOException,
                                                             UnknownCharsetException
        Extract metadata from a tabular file using a sample (defined by MAX_SAMPLE_SIZE) of the file. The extraction process is based on the frequency of character in the sample using 3 different approaches. The method will not return any default value if no delimiter and/or quote character can be found in the sample. The caller should decide which default values should be used to read the file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - a Path pointing to a file (not a folder).
        Returns:
        new TabularFileMetadata, never null (but the content can be null).
        Throws:
        IOException
        UnknownCharsetException

      • getDelimiterChar

        public static Optional<Character> getDelimiterChar(List<String> sample)
        Given a sample of line, this method tries to determine the delimiter char used.
        Parameters:
        sample -
        Returns:
        the determined delimiter or Optional.empty if it can not be determined.
